biotools.summary: Simple command-line tool that enables rapid and flexible production of text tables tailored for aggregation plots from which users can easily design multiple groups based on user-definitions such as regulatory regions or transcription initiation sites.

bioschemas.name: agplus
bioschemas.summary: Simple command-line tool that enables rapid and flexible production of text tables tailored for aggregation plots from which users can easily design multiple groups based on user-definitions such as regulatory regions or transcription initiation sites.
